name: Fire !!
description:
Submission for GMTK Jam 2020 (Theme: Out of control).

Made with Godot Engine.

---

Help this poor guy get to water before it's too late. You can drop rocks by clicking anywhere, running into one will make him change direction.

Controls: mouse

--- 

This is my first game made with the Godot engine.  Not very happy with it. But hey, it's something. Apologies for the awful awful art ;)
